show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: The “T” Word: A Political Quandary
content:
What is it about the word “terrorist” that—pardon the pun—terrorizes people who consider themselves politically left of... <!--more--> center?
They just hate to use the word.
So, naturally, Leid Stories devotes today’s program to just that subject, hoping to expose what for many is a quandary: using the language and definitions of “the other side” when there is such sharp disagreement with their ideology and just about everything they stand for.
But fear not, good souls, we shall calmly and methodically locate the source of this problem and, of course, deal with it!
